content: this pattern is an adaptation from robinlynn 1 s my cup of tea socks 2 which is a free design on ravelry robin was kind enough to share her own pattern and chart and to allow me to publish this adaptation as a free design thank you so much robin these mitts are worked from the bottom up and are designed for a small adult hand because the crocus stitch is only knit on one side of the mitt it is very easy to adjust the width by adding or removing stitches in the plain stockinette area i recommend using sock yarn or firmly plied fingering yarn to avoid pilling singles yarn is not recommended for this pattern 1 http //www ravelry com/designers/robin-lynn 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/my-cup-of-tea-socks
